title: What is the default storage path of common files on my phone?
answer:
By default, files received by Bluetooth are saved in the bluetooth folder in File Manager. 

 By default, photos or videos captured with the phone's camera are saved in the DCIM folder in File Manager. 

 By default, screenshots captured on the phone are saved in the Pictures folder in File Manager. 

 By default, sound recordings made with the phone are saved in the Recordings folder in File Manager.
keywords: storage path, default storage location, storage location, default storage
